quotes.quote: Be careful to not haul around in our lives so many nice but unnecessary things that we are distracted and diverted from the things that truly matter most.
We are prisoners of the unnecessary things we amass, and the only way to discover our beautiful true selves is by chipping everything unnecessary out of our lives.
Great is the guilt of an unnecessary war.
Man's role is uncertain, undefined, and perhaps unnecessary.
Civilization is the limitless multiplication of unnecessary necessities.
Just like sweeping the streets, sweep the unnecessary things from your mind too; keep your mind clean!
We live in an age when unnecessary things are our only necessities.
I am completely attracted to the idea of simplicity, or at least removing things that seem unnecessary when trying to get an idea out there.
Be discreet in all things, and so render it unnecessary to be mysterious about any.
Unnecessary silence upon emotions and exigency is an act of self-immolation of your rights and ways.
When two men in business always agree, one of them is unnecessary.
Give thanks to God, who made necessary things simple, and complicated things unnecessary.
The ability to simplify means to eliminate the unnecessary so that the necessary may speak.
If two people were exactly alike, one of them would be unnecessary.
If a man does not work at necessary and good things, then he will work at unnecessary and stupid things.
Unity in things Necessary, Liberty in things Unnecessary, and Charity in all.
We are ignorant of things necessary, because we learn things superfluous and unnecessary.
What is necessary is possible, what we want is expensive. What is unnecessary is unlikely.
A wise man will make haste to forgive, because he knows the true value of time, and will not suffer it to pass away in unnecessary pain.
I do a good job of blocking painful, unnecessary things from my memory.
To me an unnecessary action, or shot, or casualty, was not only waste but sin.
Stress is unnecessary and unnecessary stress is very unnecessary.
All of our technology is completely unnecessary to a happy life.
The government is best which makes itself unnecessary.
If your mind isn't clouded by unnecessary things, This is the best season of your life.
Friendship is unnecessary, like philosophy, like art... It has no survival value; rather it is one of those things that give value to survival.
The design of everyday things is in great danger of becoming the design of superfluous, overloaded, unnecessary things.
Our vision for the world is making car ownership unnecessary.
Fear is sort of like jealousy. It's an unnecessary emotion.
Memory is the greatest of artists, and effaces from your mind what is unnecessary.
